abstract: Institutional investors joined a “bumper crop of proxy fights,” a JPMorgan regulator faced tough questions, Nasdaq’s plan to settle Facebook claims met investor anger and tensions grew between MF Global trustees. A look back on the past week’s highs and lows.
snippet: Institutional investors joined a “bumper crop of proxy fights,” a JPMorgan regulator faced tough questions, Nasdaq’s plan to settle Facebook claims met investor anger and tensions grew between MF Global trustees. A look back on the past week’s hig...
lead_paragraph: Institutional investors joined in on proxy fights, JPMorgan’s front-line regulator faced a fiery round of questioning, Nasdaq’s plan to settle Facebook claims met investor anger and the turf war between MF Global trustees grew increasingly tense. A look back on our reporting of the past week’s highs and lows in ferocious finance.

headline.main: DealBook’s Week in Review: Nobody Is Happy
